description: Regal Bryant is a convict sent by the Pope of Tethe`alla to capture http://anidb.net/ch11679 [Colette]. Regal joins the party after he recognizes http://anidb.net/ch11715 [Presea]. He is a kind and noble soul, and a very talented cook. He is very content with being alone, although he does enjoy company and conversation.
name: Regal Bryan
